title: Naruto: Honoo no Chuunin Shiken! Naruto vs. Konohamaru!!

alternative_titles.en: Naruto Shippuden: Chunin Exam on Fire! Naruto vs. Konohamaru!
alternative_titles.ja: 炎の中忍試験! ナルトvs木ノ葉丸!!

synopsis:
As the Fourth Great Ninja War quickly approaches, Sunagakure hosts a special Chunin exam to strengthen the troops of the Allied Shinobi Forces. Among the participants are Konohamaru Sarutobi, an ambitious rookie, and Naruto Uzumaki, who has become a renowned ninja. Despite the significant disparity in skill, Konohamaru is excited at the prospect of proving himself in a competition against Naruto—the one person he both admires and sees as his rival.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
